name: Magic Slayer
description:
In magic slayer, you are a powerful wizard with one objective: kill zombies! Experience the true fantasy zombie game!

Defeat as many zombies as you can in 60 seconds in the arcade mode or challenge your friends in the same computer multiplayer and finally decide who's the best zombie slayer!

In singleplayer mode, use your basic attack and your two special abilities to defeat hordes of zombies and beat the highscore!

In multiplayer mode, compete against a friend in the same computer to see who can kill more zombies! A game lasts best of five rounds. Whenever you kill a zombie, you get money to buy new perks between rounds, which can be benefitial for you, or a downgrade for your foe! The choice is yours to make!

Play it on Windows or Mac! 

(On Mac the cursor is sometimes huge, we are looking into that.)

Check the patch notes: https://pastebin.com/TEUHmgwR Magic Slayer is the first game by West Games, made by Andrés Sanchez and Héctor Balsells. To know more about our work, follow us on instagram @ggwestplay.
